content: **knitted blanket for baby in drops babymerino piece is knitted with wave pattern ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no bm-090-by yarn group a ---------------------------------------------------------- measurements width approx 45-65 cm = 17 3/4 -25 1/2 length approx 52-80 cm = 20 1/2 -31 1/2 **materials** drops babymerino from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 150-250 g color 05 light pink ---------------------------------------------------------- accessories for the piece **knitting gauge ** 24 stitches in width and 40 row vertically with a 2 = 10 x 10 cm = 4 x 4 1 repetition of a 2 measures approx 7 cm = 2 3/4 in width needles drops circular needle size 4 mm = us 6 length 60 or 80 cm = 24 or 32 for blanket needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm = 4 switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm = 4 switch to smaller needles
